data.text:
Hi guys, happy Monday! Iâ€™m here with another Music Monday. This meme was created by Drew @The Tattooed Book Geek.

This week I bring you Deadmau5 a Canadian DJ from Niagara Falls, Ontario. He partnered up with my favourite, Gerard Way, for this song. Iâ€™m not a big Deadmau5 fan, but this one is pretty goodâ€¦ again Iâ€™m biased about that ðŸ˜‰
